text:
Word 2011: In track changes mode "final showing markup", most text missing in some table rows

I'm using track changes to edit a large table (several columns, many rows
spanning multiple pages). Some columns have only one or a few words, while
others have two or three paragraphs of one to three sentences each.

The problem I'm having is that with track changes turned on in "final showing
markup" mode, there are several table rows in which only the last word in the
last paragraph is actually displayed (this is true whether there's only one
word, several words, or one or more paragraphs in a given cell). The displayed
text is in the right physical location, but the rest of each cell's area is
blank. This problem seems to happen only in table rows that have been heavily
edited and only in some but not all heavily edited rows.

Does anyone have an idea of why this occurs and how to fix it?
